Item.Description:
iPhone 4 for AT&T in mint condition, only used for two months and didnt like it. Going back to my blackberry. No cracks but a few tiny scratches on screen and a few scratches on the sides. Comes in original box with original earphones, original charger, plastic screen cover kit, car charger and a phone cover for protection. Earphones have never been used. Buy at your own risk. Seller is not responsible for shipping damages n no returns. Buyer is responsible for all shipping charges. If out of the US, buyer must contact seller in order to figure out shipping cost. Thank you for viewing

Posted with eBay Mobile
Item.Title: Apple iPhone 4 Bundel - 8GB - AT&T Smartphone Slightly Used/ Mint. Cond.
